mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_board where board_category_cd = #{code} and title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select * from ( select rownum as rn, a.* from ( select b.*, p.name product_name, p.content product_content, coalesce(r.replycnt,0) as replycnt from tbl_board b left join tbl_product p on b.product_id = p.product_id left join ( select board_no, count(*) as replycnt from tbl_reply group by board_no) r on b.board_no = r.board_no where board_category_cd = 201 and title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' order by b.board_no desc ) a order by rownum ) where rn <= #{page} * #{boardPerPage} and rn > (#{page}-1) * #{boardPerPage}
select b.*, p.name product_name, p.content product_content from tbl_board b left join tbl_product p on b.product_id = p.product_id where board_no = 6
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board values (seq_board_no.nextval, #{member_no}, #{nickname}, #{board_category_cd}, #{product_id}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, sysdate, #{mainimage})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_board where board_category_cd = #{board_category_cd} order by board_no desc
